Active Aggression.name: Active Aggression
Active Aggression.effect: While in play, this Thought or Group must declare an engagement every turn if able.

Active Power-amp.name: Active Power-amp
Active Power-amp.effect: While in play, increase the Power all of your own Thoughts in play by 4.

Challenger Power-up.name: Challenger Power-up
Challenger Power-up.effect: While resolving an engagement, the Power of this Thought doubles.

Direct-challenge Power-up.name: Direct-challenge Power-up
Direct-challenge Power-up.effect: While engaging a Thinker, the Power of this Thought doubles.

End-turn Disengage.name: End-turn Disengage
End-turn Disengage.effect: When a turn ends, Disengage this Thought or Group.

End-turn Discard.name: End-turn Discard
End-turn Discard.effect: When a turn ends, remove this card from play.

Engaged Penalty.name: Engaged Penalty
Engaged Penalty.effect: While Engaged, you may only Disengage this Thought or Group by removing one other Thought you control.

Post-challenge Discard.name: Post-challenge Discard
Post-challenge Discard.effect: When this card resolves an engagement, remove it from play.

Post-challenge Pluck.name: Post-challenge Pluck
Post-challenge Pluck.effect: When this card resolves an engagement, discard the top card of a target deck.

Removed Recollection.name: Removed Recollection
Removed Recollection.effect: When this card is removed from play, you may play a Thought from your discard pile with less cost.

Removed Pluck.name: Removed Recollection
Removed Pluck.effect: When this card is removed from play, discard the top card of a target deck.

Thoughtless Recollect.name: Thoughtless Recollect
Thoughtless Recollect.effect: When you have no other Thoughts in play, this card may be played from the Discard pile on your turn.

Thoughtless Recollect.name: Thoughtless Recollect
Thoughtless Recollect.effect: When you have no other Thoughts in play, this card may be played from the Discard pile on your turn.
